name: Tiny Evil Cubes
description:
This is literally the first game I was involved as a designer and programmer using GameMaker studio2. We made this game as the final project of a game design course. It is a local multiplayer game and really fun especially when playing with your friend. Once you are bounced outside the screen, you will respawn randomly from above but with a cost of all your scores! So be careful till the last second of the game!

Unfortunately, this game do not have a H5 version(I only brought the desktop version of GameMaker..), so I only uploaded the macOS build(windows build will be available later). But definitely check it out and enjoy!

Oh, and I almost forgot, don't forget to check out the jukebox in the game!
